modName: Airbender Aila and Avatar race CBBE
summary: Here\'s Aila, the latest avatar. After peace had reached all elemental nations the use for the avatar was no longer needed. Aila has now traveled to Tamriel.
descriptionHtml:
***************Required ApachiiHairStyles*******************

[url=http://youtu.be/jPQ0TxmfRyE]Dual wield firebender spell video[/url]

Here\'s Aila, the latest avatar. After peace had reached all elemental nations the use for the avatar was no longer needed. Aila has now traveled to Tamriel to help fight for peace and justice. After seeing all the death and destruction brought on to this world she has exiled herself from mankind to meditate and talk to the spirits. Some say that she has been seen on the highest point in all of Skyrim. It\'s to believed that she is a master of conjuration.

Also, the airbender is a playable race (female only atm).

Install via NMM or extract to data folder.
UPDATE*****
v2 - Changed hairstyles for Aila, must have ApachiiHairStyles installed.. Added a new Firebender spell and tome. Spell tome is located in Dragonsreach on the desk in the \"magic room\", first room on the right with the enchanting and alchemy tables. 2 different effect for one handed or dual equip. See vid for dual.

Thanks to Better Females by Bella and ApachiiHairStyles for the awesome work.
author: n1x4
